metadata.name: Suspicious GetTypeFromCLSID ShellExecute
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious Powershell code that execute COM Objects

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('::gettypefromclsid(')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.shellexecute(')))

output.summary: Detects suspicious Powershell code that execute COM Objects
